description.value: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body. You can cast touch of the void targeting a living creature using 2 actions instead of 1. If you do, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute if it fails its save (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} if it critically fails).
